verbs.description: President Trump [V: has] ordered his Energy secretary to take immediate action to stem power plant closures , arguing that a decline in coal and nuclear electricity is putting the nation ’s security at risk .

[ARG0: President Trump] has [V: ordered] [ARG1: his Energy secretary] [ARG2: to take immediate action to stem power plant closures] , [ARGM-PRD: arguing that a decline in coal and nuclear electricity is putting the nation ’s security at risk] .

President Trump has ordered [ARG0: his Energy secretary] to [V: take] [ARG1: immediate action to stem power plant closures] , arguing that a decline in coal and nuclear electricity is putting the nation ’s security at risk .

President Trump has ordered [ARG0: his Energy secretary] to take immediate action to [V: stem] [ARG1: power plant closures] , arguing that a decline in coal and nuclear electricity is putting the nation ’s security at risk .

[ARG0: President Trump] has ordered his Energy secretary to take immediate action to stem power plant closures , [V: arguing] [ARG1: that a decline in coal and nuclear electricity is putting the nation ’s security at risk] .

President Trump has ordered his Energy secretary to take immediate action to stem power plant closures , arguing that a decline in coal and nuclear electricity [V: is] putting the nation ’s security at risk .

President Trump has ordered his Energy secretary to take immediate action to stem power plant closures , arguing that [ARG0: a decline in coal and nuclear electricity] is [V: putting] [ARG1: the nation ’s security] [ARG2: at risk] .
